name: Advanced Seminar on Issues in Contemporary Sociology
description: Exploration of current debates and controversies surrounding recent scholarly developments in Sociology. Check the department website for details at: www.utsc.utoronto.ca/sociology/programs.
prerequisites: [SOCB05H3 or [(SOCB40H3) and (SOCB41H3)]] and [1.0 credit from the following: SOCB30H3, SOCB42H3, SOCB43H3, SOCB47H3, (SOCC39H3)] and [an additional 1.0 credit at the C-level in Sociology]
